title: Helium 10 Cerebro Tutorial; How to Find KDP Keywords and Low Competition Niches

tactics.name: Keyword Filtering with Helium 10
tactics.description: Use Helium 10 X-Ray to identify long-tail keywords and filter by search volume and competition
steps: Use X-Ray to analyze keyword variations and competition
Filter results by search volume (>=500/month) and competing products (<=1200)
Sort by Cerebro IQ score (high = better opportunity)
caveats: Slow internet may delay data loading
source_quotes: I want to make sure that I get keywords for books that get at least 500 searches a month

tactics.name: Keyword Discovery with Cerebro
tactics.description: Use Cerebro to extract keyword ideas from existing books, filter by search volume and competition, and prioritize high-IQ keywords.
steps: Input selected books to generate keyword ideas
Sort by IQ score for relevance
Refine further by competition range (1000+ products)
caveats: Some keywords may be trademarked and require manual filtering
source_quotes: 'I'm going to narrow it down... at least 700 search volume'

tactics.name: Cerebro Keyword Research
tactics.description: Use Helium 10 Cerebro to find low-competition niches by filtering criteria like price range and monthly revenue.
caveats: May fail to find niches if criteria are too narrow
source_quotes: volume you can put in the category here I'm gonna put in books um you can put in the competition range...

heuristics.name: Cerebro IQ Prioritization
heuristics.condition: If a keyword has high search volume and low competition, prioritize it
source_quotes: The higher this cerebral IQ score the better

heuristics.name: IQ Score Prioritization
heuristics.condition: If a keyword has a high IQ score (indicating balance between search volume and competition), prioritize it for listing optimization
source_quotes: 'Sort it by IQ score... gives you a lot of information'

heuristics.name: Low Review Boost
source_quotes: I want low competition I want to sell the product for between zero and thirty dollars...

claims.statement: BSR numbers closer to zero indicate higher sales volume on Amazon
source_quotes: If this number were 2 million this is not a keyword that I would want to Target

claims.statement: Cerebro and Magnet tools can identify high-search-volume, low-competition keywords for KDP listings
source_quotes: 'These are all keywords you can use... get a lot of traffic'

claims.statement: Helium 10 Cerebro generates niche ideas across diverse categories by filtering sales and competition data.
source_quotes: it'll give you just ideas not in one particular Niche It's Just Books...

niche_patterns.description: Combine specific audience identities with problem-solving keywords and temporal constraints
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances search volume with niche specificity
source_quotes: I'm looking at it and I think it's let's say it's a doable keyword

niche_patterns.example: teen girls + habit tracker + low competition
niche_patterns.description: Combine specific audience identities with niche interests and competition filters to identify underserved markets
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances targeted demand with reduced competition for better ranking potential
source_quotes: 'Many habits for teens... never thought of as a book idea'
